active_incidents.title: Users may be seeing an error that Slack has stopped responding

notes.body: We’ve identified the cause of the issue and we’re working on getting a fix out as soon as possible. We’ll be back with another update as soon as there's one to share.
If you're not currently experiencing any errors in Slack, please do not reload your app or browser. We're still investigating the issue but we'll provide new information as soon as it’s available.
Some customers may be seeing an error that Slack has stopped responding. We're investigating and will be back with an update as soon as we have more information to share.
